scripts.!note1: NOTE: We do `npm pack` of the main iconv-lite package followed by installing it to create a copy of the package (not symlink).
scripts.!note2: This is needed because webpack4/watchpack1.7 crashes when trying to enumerate circular symlink.
scripts.test: rm -r node_modules/iconv-lite package-lock.json && npm install --no-audit && karma start
